task.title: Rename Rust binary to agent-relay-broker and clean up TS CLI legacy patterns

events.content: Removed --no-spawn for dashboard launch: Removed --no-spawn for dashboard launch

raw.question: Removed --no-spawn for dashboard launch
raw.reasoning: In integrated dashboard builds, --no-spawn disables RelayAdapter creation, causing /api/spawn to return broker-mode adapter errors.

retrospective.summary: Fixed dashboard spawn failure by removing --no-spawn from CLI dashboard launch args; added regression test.
